packs.hint: Warm and sunny! Pack light and colourful.

correctItems.name: Kente Cloth
correctItems.funFact: Kente is hand-woven by the Ashanti people of Ghana!

correctItems.name: Sunscreen
correctItems.funFact: Ghana is close to the equator so the sun is very strong!

correctItems.name: Drumsticks
correctItems.funFact: Djembe drums are an important part of Ghanaian music!

correctItems.name: Water Bottle
correctItems.funFact: Staying hydrated is important when exploring!

correctItems.name: Camera
correctItems.funFact: You will want photos of Cape Coast Castle!

correctItems.name: Passport
correctItems.funFact: You need a passport to travel to another country!

distractors.name: Snow Boots
distractors.funFact: Ghana is tropical — you won’t need these!

distractors.name: Ice Skates
distractors.funFact: There are no ice rinks in Accra!

distractors.name: Ski Goggles
distractors.funFact: No skiing in Ghana — it’s warm year-round!

correctItems.name: Umbrella
correctItems.funFact: London gets rain almost 150 days a year!

correctItems.name: Warm Jacket
correctItems.funFact: British weather can be chilly even in summer!

correctItems.name: London Map
correctItems.funFact: London has over 270 Tube stations to explore!

correctItems.name: Camera
correctItems.funFact: Big Ben and Tower Bridge are must-see landmarks!

correctItems.name: Passport
correctItems.funFact: You need a passport to enter the United Kingdom!

correctItems.name: Scarf
correctItems.funFact: A scarf keeps you cosy on windy London days!

distractors.name: Surfboard
distractors.funFact: The Thames is not a surfing spot!

distractors.name: Snorkel
distractors.funFact: London’s rain is above you, not below!

distractors.name: Flip Flops
distractors.funFact: Too cold for flip flops in London most of the year!

packs.hint: Hot and buzzing! Pack for adventure.

correctItems.name: Sunglasses
correctItems.funFact: Lagos is one of the sunniest cities in West Africa!

correctItems.name: Light Dress
correctItems.funFact: Nigerians love bright, colourful clothing!

correctItems.name: Water Bottle
correctItems.funFact: Lagos can be very hot — stay hydrated!

correctItems.name: Camera
correctItems.funFact: Lagos has amazing markets and beaches to photograph!

correctItems.name: Passport
correctItems.funFact: Nigeria is in West Africa — don’t forget your passport!

correctItems.name: Sun Hat
correctItems.funFact: A hat keeps the strong Nigerian sun off your face!

distractors.name: Heavy Coat
distractors.funFact: Way too hot for a heavy coat in Nigeria!

distractors.name: Ice Skates
distractors.funFact: No frozen lakes in tropical Lagos!

packs.hint: Big city vibes! Comfy shoes are a must.

correctItems.name: Comfy Shoes
correctItems.funFact: You will walk a LOT exploring New York City!

correctItems.name: Camera
correctItems.funFact: The Statue of Liberty is one of the most photographed landmarks!

correctItems.name: City Map
correctItems.funFact: New York has five boroughs to explore!

correctItems.name: Passport
correctItems.funFact: The USA is a big country — bring your passport!

correctItems.name: Hoodie
correctItems.funFact: New York evenings can be cool, even in summer!

correctItems.name: Backpack
correctItems.funFact: A backpack is handy for carrying snacks in Central Park!

distractors.name: Surfboard
distractors.funFact: Manhattan is not a surfing destination!

distractors.name: Ski Goggles
distractors.funFact: No ski slopes in the middle of New York City!

distractors.name: Snorkel
distractors.funFact: The Hudson River is not for snorkelling!
